faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Most common questions.
faq.a1: It’s recommended to grant trading permissions only (no withdrawals). Key handling depends on your operational policy.
faq.q2: Can I use it on mobile?
faq.a2: With responsive design, the same features work on PC/tablet/mobile.
faq.q3: How long does a reply take?
faq.a3: It depends on business hours and ticket volume. If you have an SLA, publish it on a policy page.
faq.a4: Check the Announcements menu for the latest updates.
faq.q5: Where do I ask about billing/refunds?
faq.a5: Submit a 1:1 inquiry with your payment details for faster handling.
